strapiPost.title: Walton Executive MBA Program Invites Professionals To Transform Their Career
strapiPost.topic: Sponsored by the Walton MBA Program at the University of Arkansas
strapiPost.content:
With business requirements constantly evolving, employers need professionals with broad knowledge of how business functions fit together. This is knowledge the Walton Executive MBA program offers through an opportunity to transform your career. 

  • Critically acclaimed: The Wall Street Journal recently ranked the Walton Executive MBA program #11 out of 600 programs for its return on investment, and U.S. News & World Reports ranked the program as the 36th best public business college in the nation. 
  • Growing professionals: Designed to accommodate the busy schedule of a working professional, the 2-year program is mostly online. Through the program, you will be able to expand your expertise in core business fields and have the opportunity to travel the world in a global immersion experience. 

The program starts in the fall. Learn more and apply HERE before July 1.
